title: 109_hr3842
content: Emergency Gas Price Relief Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce highway motor fuel excise taxes by 10 cents per gallon, beginning on the date when the retail price for gasoline is greater than $3.00 per gallon and ending when such price is less than $2.50 per gallon . Provides for adjustments to such excise tax for floor stocks of highway motor fuels held by dealers prior to the reduction period or after the reduction period .
